Plot: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.
Title: Our Idiot Brother
Writer: Jesse Peretz (story), Evgenia Peretz (story), David Schisgall (story), Evgenia Peretz (screenplay), David Schisgall (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Rudd, Nick Sullivan, Francesca Papalia, Bob Stephenson
tomatoConsensus: It's decidedly uneven, but like Paul Rudd's performance in the title role, Our Idiot Brother is too charming to resist.
